author: Timothy Linward
description:
Games Workshop has revealed 105 units that will receive rules for Warhammer the Horus Heresy third edition in a free ‘Legacies of Darkness’ PDF. The firm published the article on Wednesday, after social media discussions around the new edition turned sour when it became clear that the core Liber army books were missing rules for many units and weapon loadouts.

Continue reading GW promises angry Warhammer the Horus Heresy fans that missing units will return
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Horus Heresy book order, Warhammer 40k factions, Warhammer 40k primarchs
title: GW promises angry Warhammer the Horus Heresy fans that missing units will return

author: Matt Bassil
description:
The release of Pokémon Black Bolt and Pokémon White Flare is just around the corner. Both sets have their official launch on July 18. We’re already seeing pack-opening videos popping up all over the shop, so it seemed high time we made a list of the very best cards you can hope to open in those packs.

Continue reading The 9 biggest chase cards in Pokémon Black Bolt and White Flare
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best Pokémon cards, Rare Pokémon cards, All Pokémon sets in order
title: The 9 biggest chase cards in Pokémon Black Bolt and White Flare

author: Mollie Russell
description:
Avalon is one of those board games that every serious tabletop fan should try at least once. The Arthurian spin-off of The Resistance has been around since 2012, and its bluffing mechanics still hold up. If you like simple yet addictive social deduction games, it’s not to be missed. Amazon is currently selling the Deluxe Edition of the game for $27.91, 30% off its usual retail price.

Continue reading This top-tier bluffing board game is royally cheap at Amazon with 30% off
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best board games, Best board games for adults, Best social deduction games
title: This top-tier bluffing board game is royally cheap at Amazon with 30% off

author: Mollie Russell
description:
The 2024 Player’s Handbook made species (formerly known as races) a far less crucial part of a Dungeons and Dragons character. It’s not quite so exciting, then, that the next D&D sourcebook features five updated species options. Still, with some careful planning, these can be assets to your future character builds. Here’s a quick overview of the upcoming Eberron species and some tips for optimizing them.

Continue reading More updated species are coming to DnD - here's how to make the most of them
MORE FROM WARGAMER: DnD 2024 Player's Handbook review, DnD classes guide, DnD races guide
title: More updated species are coming to DnD - here's how to make the most of them

author: Matt Bassil
description:
I always love it when a new Magic: The Gathering release serves up a combo that only uses cards from the upcoming set. This brilliant bit of synergy relies on two Edge of Eternities spells and with it, you can deck your opponent and blast them for 100 damage, all at the same time.

Continue reading This Edge of Eternities MTG combo can beat your opponent twice in one turn
MORE FROM WARGAMER: All MTG sets in order, Upcoming MTG release dates, How to play MTG
title: This Edge of Eternities MTG combo can beat your opponent twice in one turn

author: Chloe Ward
description:
The Star Wars: Unlimited TCG series currently features five sets, with Twilight of the Republic standing as the impressive third instalment, and it’s still relevant, with plenty of its cards contributing to powerful decks. If you’re looking to add to your existing collection, you can even get 51% off an entire booster box containing 24 packs - provided you’re quick.

Continue reading Get a Star Wars Unlimited Twilight of the Republic booster at a 51% discount
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best card games, Best Trading Card Games, MTG release schedule
title: Get a Star Wars Unlimited Twilight of the Republic booster at a 51% discount
